title: Bug 44050SWT.BORDER Text should display thin black border on PocketPC
EB: Bug 44050SWT.BORDER Text should display thin black border on PocketPC SWT.BORDER should probably use WSBORDER instead of extended styleEXCLIENTEDGE for Text on Pocket PC, to get the common thin black borderinstead of the 3d border that is not used on PocketPC.
